hadiths.text: Narrated Anas: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prohibited that a man should put on sandals while he is standing." [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Gharib. Muhammad bin Isma'il said: "This Hadith is not correct, not the Hadith of Ma'mar from 'Ammar bin Abi 'Ammar, from Abu Hurairah (no)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ أَنْ يَنْتَعِلَ الرَّجُلُ وَهُوَ قَائِمٌ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About It Being Disliked For A Man To Don Sandals While Standing
